# Overview

Ventricular assist devices are mechanical cardiac supports that augment native function of either ventricle. They can be divided into:

* Permanent systems\
For end-stage heart failure patients, used as a:
	* Bridge to transplant
	* Bridge to decision
	* Bridge to transplant candidacy
	* Destination therapy
* Temporary systems
	* Bridge to recovery
	* Bridge to bridge\
	Prior to implantation of a permanent system.


:::column-margin
In Australia, a permanent VAD is only funded as a bridge to transplant.
:::

## Equipment

A VAD consists of a:

* Inflow cannula
* Outflow cannula
* Externally-controlled pump

## Technique

* Preload dependent
* Afterload sensitive
